input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Jack Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
The Oxford button-down is a stylish wardrobe staple with endless versatility, so it’s no surprise that our signature Oxford, The Jack, has become a mainstay of our roster. Its burly 100% organic cotton basket weave and double-needle felled construction make it sturdy enough to stand up to the roughest workday, while peerless tailoring and a clean, pleatless design means it’s snazzy enough for your next night on the town. Soft to the touch but built for a decade of solid wear. Oxford is a perfectly versatile fabric that looks just as good pressed as it does pulled off the back of a chair. While traditional cotton uses 25% of the world's pesticides, our organic cotton doesn't use a drop. A better shirt, Responsibly Built For The Long Haul. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton. Made from our burly rugby oxford. Our signature Jack button-down collar. Garment dyed and washed for a soft, lived-in feel. Double-needle felled construction throughout. Natural buttons. Lock-stitched buttons and buttonholes. Shorter length to be worn untucked. Tailored fit and high armhole. No pleats for easy ironing and clean lines. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Model is 6'0", wearing a Medium.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='OU Ellis Sky Solid Oxford'
  - Name='SMU Ellis Sky Solid Oxford'
  - Name='Leeward No Tuck Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Todd Snyder Men's Cotton Poplin Long Point Collar Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Slim Fit Stripe Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cotton Oxford Stripe Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Royal Oxford Stripe Cotton Formal Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Button-Down Collar Oxford Short Sleeve Cotton Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Westminster Weave Cotton Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Button-Down Non-Iron Oxford Grid Checkered Cotton Formal Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Checkered Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Washed Oxford Stripe Short Sleeve Cotton Shirt - Blue - Single Cuff - Size: Small'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Cotton Formal Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Charles Tyrwhitt England Rugby Washed Oxford Stripe Shirt'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Everyday Casual Check Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Organic Cotton Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Bowery Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Buck Mason Men's Pacific Twill Vintage One Pocket Shirt'
  - Name='Buck Mason Men's Pacific Cotton Twill Classic Fit Button Down Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Plaid Ledge Shirt'
  - Name='Buck Mason Men's Tough Twill Workshirt'
  - Name='Buck Mason Men's Classic Fit Flannel Plaid Work Shirt'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Hawthorne Striped Organic Cotton Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: OU Ellis Sky Solid Oxford
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Based on the name, this appears to be a solid oxford shirt, highly similar in function, material, and silhouette to The Jack Shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SMU Ellis Sky Solid Oxford
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is also indicated as a solid oxford, making it directly comparable in style and function to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Leeward No Tuck Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While the 'No Tuck' and dress shirt features are relevant for a tailored fit and casual wear, 'Leeward' shirts may emphasize technical performance fabrics over traditional oxford cloth; still, silhouette is similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Todd Snyder Men's Cotton Poplin Long Point Collar Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This shirt is a poplin (different weave/texture than oxford) and features a long point collar (versus a button-down), so functionally less direct, but shares basic shirt silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is described as a stretch washed cotton oxford – near identical type of product with slight stretch material addition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is described as a stretch washed cotton oxford – near identical type of product with slight stretch material addition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as previous entry—direct match in most relevant features to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Stretch Washed Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as previous entry—direct match in most relevant features to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Slim Fit Stripe Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An oxford shirt in slim fit; the striped variation only minimally affects core function. Very similar product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cotton Oxford Stripe Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cotton Oxford shirt, albeit described as a 'dress shirt' which may imply a more formal cut, but still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Royal Oxford Stripe Cotton Formal Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 'Royal Oxford' typically refers to a finer, dressier weave than standard oxford; still, shirt type and core use are similar, with more formal intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Button-Down Collar Oxford Short Sleeve Cotton Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve oxford has the same general silhouette, fabric, and button-down collar, but the sleeve length makes it less directly comparable to the reference long sleeve shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Westminster Weave Cotton Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Westminster weave is a different construction from oxford; this shirt is less directly comparable in fabric, though still a button-down shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Button-Down Non-Iron Oxford Grid Checkered Cotton Formal Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford shirt with button-down collar; formal, non-iron, and grid pattern may shift usage to more formal settings but remains similar in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Checkered Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford shirt with stretch and non-iron treatment; checkered pattern is a minor difference. Still highly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Washed Oxford Stripe Short Sleeve Cotton Shirt - Blue - Single Cuff - Size: Small
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Washed Oxford short sleeve shirt; relevant core material and construction but less direct due to sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt Non-Iron Twill Cotton Formal Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Twill is a different weave than oxford; likely dressier and less rugged, so less comparable to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Charles Tyrwhitt England Rugby Washed Oxford Stripe Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford construction, 'rugby' description may imply heavier build like the reference product's 'burly rugby oxford', making this quite comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Everyday Casual Check Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual check shirt is functionally similar but may employ a non-oxford weave or different material, making it moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Organic Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct match: organic cotton oxford shirt, very close in silhouette, features, and target use to The Jack Shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Bowery Wrinkle-Free Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Your basic dress shirt, likely more formal in construction, and possibly not oxford weave; some overlap in use, but less rugged/casual intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Buck Mason Men's Pacific Twill Vintage One Pocket Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Twill weave is distinctly different from oxford, and 'vintage' and 'one pocket' features suggest a more workwear/heritage product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Buck Mason Men's Pacific Cotton Twill Classic Fit Button Down Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Button down shirt with classic fit, but twill fabric differs from oxford; silhouette and end-use are similar though.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Plaid Ledge Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton and tailored construction, but 'plaid ledge shirt' is likely a different style/cut from the Jack Shirt, though made by the same brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Buck Mason Men's Tough Twill Workshirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Workshirt in tough twill is structurally and stylistically more rugged, with different intended use than a classic oxford button-down.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Buck Mason Men's Classic Fit Flannel Plaid Work Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flannel work shirt is a different fabric (flannel) and style (plaid work shirt), making it much less comparable to a classic oxford.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Hawthorne Striped Organic Cotton Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Organic cotton shirt from Taylor Stitch; likely shares similar tailoring and some construction features, though 'Hawthorne' may imply a lighter shirt or different silhouette.
